short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Empower your browsing experience with voice commands! Our tool makes the web accessible and navigable for everyone

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Navigate the internet like a conversation. Use your voice to interact with websites like never before.

Think of it like Siri, but for your web browser.

Intuitive, accessible, and made to empower the blind, visually impaired, and more.

Features:
- Quickly identify or summarize information on page
- Input text into text fields, click buttons, scroll to elements, etc
- More features to come
